alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:18AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Dale, Henry, Houston, Miller, Clay and Early Counties through 1145 AM EDT/1045 AM CDT/... At 1117 AM EDT/1017 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blue Springs State Park to Webb to 6 miles southeast of Cottonwood. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Colquitt, Cottonwood, Fort Gaines, Blakely, Headland, Dothan, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Centerville, Rehobeth, Grimes, Avon, Newville, Napier Field and Madrid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/ for southeastern Alabama...the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
